--boundary123 Content-Type: application/pdf Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="YAGO_Voice_Report_{{ $json.stats.yesterday.replace(///g, '-') }}.pdf" Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64 ' + $binary.data.toString('base64') + ' --boundary123-- ').toString('base64') }}" }

={
  "ok": true,
  "message": "AI 음성 리포트 생성 및 전송 완료",
